title: 170 magic icons 2D
description: Bring your game to life with our carefully crafted set of 170 magic icons, available in a variety of vibrant color options.
longDescription:
Transform your fantasy RPG with stunning magic icons!


Bring your game to life with our carefully crafted set of 170 magic icons, available in a variety of vibrant color options. These icons are perfect for fantasy settings and will help you create an immersive experience that will captivate your players.


Key Features:

Vast Collection: 170 unique magic icons, providing a diverse range of spells and abilities for your game.


High Resolution: Icons are displayed at 1024x1024 pixels, providing crisp, detailed images that look great on any screen size.

Versatile Use: Ideal for skill trees, HUDs, inventory systems, and spellbooks in fantasy RPGs, strategy games, and other genre-blending projects.

Easy to Integrate: Provided in PNG format with a black background, making it easy to add these icons to your project regardless of your chosen game engine or development platform.

How to use this resource:

Whether you’re developing a mobile game, a tabletop RPG, or an indie adventure game, these icons are versatile and adaptable to any project. High-resolution PNG files ensure your spells will look stunning on any screen, from small mobile displays to large monitors. Use color variations to represent different spell types, levels, or affinities, adding depth and variety to your game’s magic system.


Technical Specifications:

File Format: PNG with black background for easy integration.

Resolution: 1024x1024 pixels for crisp, detailed icons.

Total Icons: 170 unique icons in a variety of colors.

Easy Integration, Immediate Impact

Integrating these icons into your project is easy. The PNG format is universally supported, and the black background makes it easy to layer and blend into different UI designs. Whether you are an experienced developer or just starting out, you will find these icons easy to work with.


Ongoing Support and Feedback

This is the first version of the resource, and we are committed to making it better with your help! We value your feedback and encourage you to leave reviews and ratings. Your input will guide future updates, ensuring that this resource continues to meet your needs.


Contact Us:

If you have any questions, concerns, or suggestions, feel free to contact us. We are here to help you get the most out of this resource and make your game as magical as possible olgabutymova27@gmail.com
